岧岧岧

岧字的基本解释

岧
tiáo
〔岧岧〕高峻的样子，如“千云雾而上达，状亭亭以岧岧。
〔岧嶢（
y俹 ）〕高峻，如“登岧岧之高岑。”

岧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tiáo］
［《廣韻》徒聊切，平蕭，定。］
亦作“岹1”。
(1)高峻貌。参见“岧直”。
(2)见“岧嵽”。
(3)见“岧”。
(4)见“岧崹”。
(5)见“岧嶤”。

岧字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　岧； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页309第16
【廣韻】徒聊切【集韻】田聊切，?音條岧嶤，山高貌。【張衡·西京賦】狀亭亭以岧岧。　【集韻】或作岹。岹?，山形。

岧字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
岧字的起名意思

高峻，高峻的样子，如“千云雾而上达，状亭亭以岧岧”，“登岧岧之高岑”。

lofty peak
Basic explanation of words
lofty peak
tiáo
〔岧岧〕The towering appearance, such as "Thousands of clouds and mists rise up, and the pavilions are shaped like 岧岧.
〔岧峣(
y 俹)] tall and steep, such as "Deng Shao Gao Cen."
lofty peak
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tiáo］
["Guangyun" only chats and cuts, Pingxiao, Ding. ]
Also known as "岹1".
(1) High and steep appearance. See "岧直".
(2) See "岧嵽".
(3) See "岧".
(4) See "岧崹".
(5) See "岧嶤".
lofty peak
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　岧; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 309 Page 16
[Guangyun] Discussing and cutting [Jiyun] Tian chatting and cutting, the sound bar is 岧嶤, the mountain is high. 【Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu】Zhuangting Pavilion is based on 岧岧.　【Ji Yun】or Zuo. Kao? Yamagata.
lofty peak

lofty peak
Name meaning
The towering and stern appearance, such as "Thousands of clouds and mists rise up, and the pavilions and pavilions are in the form of 岧岧."
tiáo
peak; cliff; precipice
